title: Teardrops on My Guitar
summary: "Teardrops on My Guitar" is a song by American singer-songwriter Taylor Swift, taken from her self-titled debut album (2006). Swift wrote the song with Liz Rose, and Nathan Chapman produced it. Big Machine Records released "Teardrops on My Guitar" on February 19, 2007, as the album's second single in the United States. The song was later included on the non-US editions of Swift's second studio album, Fearless (2008), and released in the United Kingdom in 2009.
